feedback: Remediation adds the required smtpd_client_restrictions setting but the postfix reload failed (exit_code=1), indicating a need to verify service restart success before considering the fix complete.
concerns: Configuration change may overwrite existing smtpd_client_restrictions without preserving prior values
Script is not fully idempotent and does not handle existing configurations gracefully
Lacks validation of syntax after modification
suggested_improvements: Use postconf -e 'smtpd_client_restrictions = permit_mynetworks,reject' to set the parameter directly
Preserve existing smtpd_client_restrictions values if they already contain other restrictions
Validate the new configuration with 'postconf -n' before reloading
Restart Postfix using systemctl restart postfix or service postfix restart to ensure proper exit code
Add error handling to report failure to reload and rollback if needed
